text: Herman Van Rompuy (born 31 October 1947) is a Belgian politician. In November 2009 he was appointed the first permanent President of the European Council, which is the meeting of the heads of government of all of the member states of the European Union. He was previously Prime Minister of Belgium. == References == Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian economists Category:Belgian academics Category:Belgian nobility Category:Belgian Roman Catholics Category:Christelijke Volkspartij politicians Category:Christen- Democratisch en Vlaams politicians Category:Flemish politicians Category:Government ministers of Belgium Category:Legislative speakers Category:People from Brussels-Capital Region Category:Presidents of the European Council Category:Prime ministers of Belgium
title: Herman Van Rompuy
